trans-unit.source: Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback here.
trans-unit.target: Bugs are tracked on GitHub Issues. In case of trouble, please check there if your issue has already been reported. If you spotted it first, help us smashing it by providing a detailed and welcomed feedback here.

trans-unit.source: OCA, or the Odoo Community Association, is a nonprofit organization whose mission is to support the collaborative development of Odoo features and promote its widespread use.
trans-unit.target: OCA,или Общественная ассоциация Odoo,является некоммерческой организацией,чья миссия заключается в поддержке совместной разработки Odoo функций и содействия его широкому использованию.

trans-unit.source: On the transfer wizard, for the products with Lot Split Type = Single, you will automatically get one line per unit (i.e. if the stock move has qty = 3, you will get 3 lines with qty = 1).
trans-unit.target: On the transfer wizard, for the products with Lot Split Type = Single, you will automatically get one line per unit (i.e. if the stock move has qty = 3, you will get 3 lines with qty = 1).

trans-unit.source: This module adds a new selection field Lot Split Type on the product form under the Inventory tab ; you should set it to Single on products that have one serial number per item.
trans-unit.target: This module adds a new selection field Lot Split Type on the product form under the Inventory tab ; you should set it to Single on products that have one serial number per item.

trans-unit.source: This module also adds a button Spread Serial Numbers on the transfer wizard which make it easy to create a sequence of serial numbers or import serial numbers from a file.
trans-unit.target: This module also adds a button Spread Serial Numbers on the transfer wizard which make it easy to create a sequence of serial numbers or import serial numbers from a file.

trans-unit.source: This module improves the usability of serial numbers in Odoo. It is very usefull when you purchase and/or sell products with one serial number per item.
trans-unit.target: Этот модуль улучшает удобство использования серийных номеров в Odoo.Он очень полезен при покупке и/или продаже продуктов с одним серийным номером на каждый предмет.

trans-unit.source: This module is maintained by the OCA.
To contribute to this module, please visit https://odoo-community.org.
trans-unit.target: To contribute to this module, please visit https://odoo-community.org.
